plot outline: Arundhati is a well educated woman working in a reputed company living with her husband Sriram.Arundhati faces lot of challenges in life where in Sriram suspects her of having affair with Raj Sardesai.But the worst comes when she is accused of a fraud worth Lakhs at her work place and an arrest warrant is issued against her name.
title: Kas
